com.software.reuze

Class gb_IsoSurfaceHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_IsoSurfaceHash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gb_i_IsoSurface

    public class gb_IsoSurfaceHash
extends Object
implements gb_i_IsoSurface
    HashMap based implementation of the IsoSurface interface. More memory efficient than gb_IsoSurfaceArrayVertices and so better suited for very high-resolution volumes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float isoValue 

    • Constructor Summary

      gb_IsoSurfaceHash(gb_a_VoxelSpace volume)

      Creates a new instance using the given expected vertex density.

    • Method Detail

      • computeSurfaceMesh

        public gb_i_Mesh computeSurfaceMesh(gb_i_Mesh mesh,
                           float iso)
        Description copied from interface: gb_i_IsoSurface
        Computes the surface mesh for the given iso-value. An existing mesh container can be reused (will be cleared) or created automatically (if null). In the latter case a simple gb_TriangleMesh instance is created.
        Specified by:
        computeSurfaceMesh in interface gb_i_IsoSurface
        Parameters:
        mesh - existing mesh container or null
        iso - surface iso value
        Returns:
        Mesh3D instance

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets mesh vertices to default positions and clears face index. Needs to be called inbetween successive calls to #computeSurfaceMesh(Mesh3D, float).
        Specified by:
        reset in interface gb_i_IsoSurface

      • setExpectedDensity

        public void setExpectedDensity(float density)
